messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Calling to all those with information on Kanabo smiths
messages.msgSnippet: HI Arnold, I ll take anything you have related to Kanabo. Regards, Louis arnold frenzel  wrote: Hi Louis: Do you want just those of polearms,
messages.messageBody:
HI Arnold, I'll take anything you have related to Kanabo.

Regards,

Louis

arnold frenzel <afrenzel@...> wrote:
Hi Louis:
Do you want just those of polearms, or any? the message could be read
either way. If any please send your address to me again, and I will
supply you with one. Regards, Arnold


>>> lshobie@... 11/19/04 3:17 PM >>>


Hello there,

I am currently building a few webpages highlighting the works of the
Kanabo smiths. I am looking for oshigata, pictures of genuine
signatures and any other information I can get my hands on.

The pages will be part of my site focusing just on yari and polearms.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Louis Skebo
www.japaneseswordcollector.com
